com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiSelectionList<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiList<T>
          • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiSelectionList<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the entry type stored within this list, the type can implement IListItem if toString() is needed for something else.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventListener<GuiButton,java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer>

    public class GuiSelectionList<T>
extends GuiList<T>
    This GUI node is a list that has a built-in scrollbar and will retain a selected item upon clicking it.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.awt.Color selectedColor
      The outline color used for the selected item.
